sentences: In the early afternoon, Co-Chair Plume reported that timing issues addressed during morning and lunch time informals were still under consideration.
With this in mind, parties considered the draft text paragraph by paragraph.
Several changes were made, in particular on climate modeling, scenarios and downscaling; and on climate-related risks and extreme events.
After small group consultations in the late evening, progress was reported on timing issues, although questions relating to an advisory working group were still to be addressed.
